data.1: Body pistols undetectable by standard detectors, explosives (bombs, grenades), and poison gas prohibited.
data.2: Portable energy weapons (laser carbine, laser rifle) prohibited. Ship's gunnery not affected.
data.3: Weapons of a strict military nature (machine guns, automatic rifles) prohibited.
data.5: Personal concealable firearms (such as pistols and revolvers) prohibited.
data.6: Most firearms (all except shotguns) prohibited. The carrying of any type of weapon openly is discouraged.
data.8: Long bladed weapons (all but daggers) are controlled, and open possession is prohibited.
data.9: Possession of any weapon outside one's residence is prohibited.
